description:
Download the most popular guide to finding and using educational apps for kids!

PARENTS TRUST KINDERTOWN
KinderTown shows you only the best educational apps for your kids. This means our team of educators and parents pick apps that your kids will love to play and will also help them learn. Stop wasting endless time searching the App Store and start using KinderTown to find great kids apps.

*Use the Learning Map to guide your child's education
*Search for apps by subject, age, and price
*See video reviews of the apps in use
*Go beyond apps with our Power Pack learning guides
*Easily share your favorite apps with friends
*Turn iPad time into educational playtime!

"KinderTown, I’ll admit, has been a personal favorite since its launch last year, as it curates the iTunes App Store for quality, educational-focused apps, vetted by former teachers." -TechCrunch 

KinderTown has been featured in The New York Times, TIME, The Huffington Post, Wired, theguardian, and TechCrunch.
trackCensoredName: KinderTown Preschool and Kindergarten Educational Games
trackName: KinderTown Preschool and Kindergarten Educational Games
releaseNotes:
- Changed banner to indicate the listed count of reviewed apps.
- Changed default sort order of the listed reviewed apps to be alphabetical.
- Changed order of information displayed for reviewed apps.
- Changed "News" icon to "Blog" to reflect the KinderTown website information.
- Highlighted the Spelling category.
- Updated for iOS 7.
